sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membeli selusin apel di pasar.
english translation: "I bought a dozen apples at the market."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Adik saya berusia belas tahun.
english translation: "My younger sibling is a teenager."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sudah pergi ke Jepang dua kali.
english translation: "I have been to Japan twice."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki uang sebanyak seratus ribu rupiah.
english translation: "He has money amounting to one hundred thousand rupiahs."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di acara itu, ada ribuan orang yang hadir.
english translation: "There were thousands of people in attendance at the event."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia telah menjual sejuta produk ini tahun ini.
english translation: "He has sold one million of this product this year."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia mendapatkan nilai 90 persen dalam ujian itu.
english translation: "He scored 90 percent on that exam."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Pada proyek itu, mereka menghabiskan semiliar dolar.
english translation: "On that project, they spent a billion dollars."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Angka itu mencapai angka triliunan dalam mata uang lokal.
english translation: "The figure reached trillions in the local currency."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ini adalah kali ketiga saya mengunjungi tempat ini.
english translation: "This is my third time visiting this place."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ada ratusan buku di rak ini.
english translation: "There are hundreds of books on this shelf."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dalam tugas ini, dia mendapatkan peringkat puluhan.
english translation: "In this assignment, he received tens of scores."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan membagi kue ini denganmu.
english translation: "I will divide this cake with you."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Persentase orang yang merokok telah menurun.
english translation: "The percentage of people who smoke has decreased."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya mengingat saat pertama kali bertemu denganmu.
english translation: "I remember the first time we met."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rumah itu menghadap ke laut.
english translation: "The house faces the sea."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia menghilang tanpa jejak.
english translation: "He disappeared without a trace."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus mengganti ban mobil yang bocor.
english translation: "I have to replace the punctured car tire."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lukamu jangan disentuh.
english translation: "Don't touch your wound."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia akan menyewa apartemen di kota itu.
english translation: "He will rent an apartment in that city."
